sentences.english: The Compound regular Team Round will not use the set system either.
sentences.chinese: 复合弓的团体比赛也不再将采用局胜制。

sentences.english: They are skilled wielders of the eastern style composite bow.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林弓箭手对东方式复合弓使用娴熟。

sentences.english: These natural horsemen are armed with a composite bow and wear light armour.
sentences.chinese: 马扎尔骑兵是天生的弓骑兵，装备复合弓和轻型链甲。

sentences.english: They wear padded or mail armour and are equipped with a composite bow and sword.
sentences.chinese: 拜占庭骑兵身穿镶甲或链甲，装备复合弓和长剑。
